content:
Hey all, i've started putting together a mapping of all the SDC (and core) extensions/properties and their applicability to the various item types (R4) - wondering if it would be useful to others or good for some reference, and also if it might help with checking compatibility of specific questionnaire instances to specific systems.
image.png
This is great! I could imagine this making it's way into the IG.

@Stoyan Halkaliev this is the sheet we were talking about on the call.
I'll also share the excel file later on too.
